projects.name: Resume Genius
projects.description: Leveraged the MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack to build a robust and scalable resume-making website with a team of 3, ensuring seamless integration of frontend and backend functionalities. Integrated advanced Natural Language Processing (NLP) techniques within the MERN framework to deliver real-time resume scoring and feedback, enhancing user experience and optimizing job application success rates.

projects.name: STC Portal
projects.description: Drove frontend development initiatives within the MERN-powered portal, crafting captivating user interfaces that seamlessly integrate with backend functionalities, enhancing overall usability and appeal with the help of 6 members. Played a pivotal role in sculpting the frontend experience of the MERN-based portal, focusing on intuitive design and smooth navigation to ensure an immersive user journey and drive engagement.

projects.name: Employee Management System
projects.description: Developed an Employee Management System using Java, applying Object-Oriented Programming principles to ensure a modular and maintainable codebase. Implemented efficient data management through well-organized class designs, showcasing strong proficiency in Java Object-Oriented Programming.

experiences.description: Immersed myself in the world of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript during my internship, crafting dynamic and visually stunning web experiences that blend innovation with user-centric design.

Guided and inspired a dynamic team of graphic designers during my internship, achieving a remarkable growth in creative output and transforming visions into captivating visual experiences that leave a lasting impact over 5 months.

As the club manager, I spearhead various activities, including recruitment and event planning, meticulously planned 5 to 6 successful events, ensuring a vibrant and engaging experience for our members. I take an active role in mentoring junior members, imparting knowledge on Java programming and Collections to foster their skills and passion for coding.

Lead and coordinate all club activities, managing recruitment processes and organizing engaging events for our members since 2 years. I guide junior members in the club through foundational Python programming and basic frontend development, fostering their understanding and proficiency in these essential skills.
